feed.title: Computational Cognitive Neuroscience of Language (CCNL)
feed.subtitle: We study the intricacies of human speech perception, how it happens in the real world, and possible related disfunctions. To do so, our lab uses insights from human behavior, human neuroimaging, computational models of speech, among other fields of research. --trace

entry.title: EDULANG Meeting 2024
entry.content: The University of Connecticut is excited to host the EDULANG Meeting 2024, focusing on “Variation & Diversity in Language Acquisition & Processing.” This event will take place from November 14th to 15th at the Konover Auditorium, Dodd Center. The meeting will feature a series of insightful talks and discussions led by renowned experts in the field. Please see text for more details.
